Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora - hammock Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora pool Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora pool Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora - stand up paddle board Tahiti Ultimate Bora Bora luxury package - Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora &vert; 8 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora Situated on a private islet nestled between the deep blue Pacific Ocean and a shimmering turquoise lagoon, this resort is famed for its attentive, Four Seasons-style service. Surrounded by lush tropical vegetation of extraordinary beauty, it offers facilities tailored to the needs of couples, families, and business travelers alike. This sanctuary fully embraces the magic of the South Seas while maintaining a strong commitment to eco-friendly and sustainable practices. View more View less 8 nights + transfers, breakfast, sightseeing & more from $ 11,369* per person share twin. Flights are additional. Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes 4 nights accommodation at Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora 4 nights accommodation at Hilton Hotel Tahiti in a 1 King Bed Ocean View Room (2 pre/2 post) Return Bora Bora & Papeete airport transfers Private Romantic 25ft Boat Lagoon Tour - Full day (Motu Lunch included) Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora inclusions American Breakfast daily Inludes 1 FREE night FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of beach towels, snorkelling equipment, kayaks, gym, stand up paddle boards, beach volleyball & tennis court Hilton Tahiti Hotel inclusions American breakfast daily Includes 1 FREE night FREE Wi-Fi^ 10% discount on 90 minute spa treatment, per day^ The Private Romantic Experience Bora Bora by Cap Camarat 25' - Full day (Motu Lunch included) Step aboard the 25-foot Cap Camarat, a private boat that blends luxury and comfort, and set off on an unforgettable journey guided by your personal captain. Cruise through warm, crystal-clear waters that shimmer in endless shades of blue. Snorkel above vibrant coral reefs teeming with rays, sharks, and brilliantly colored tropical fish. Continue your adventure to a secluded Motu, an island paradise where a traditional Polynesian lunch awaits. After your meal, unwind on the pristine white-sand beach, wander through lush tropical foliage, or take a refreshing swim in the calm lagoon waters. This exclusive experience is fully customizable to your desires, with your local captain sharing insider knowledge of the island’s most breathtaking spots and hidden gems. Room Types 1 Bedroom Beach View Overwater Bungalow Suite Featuring traditional teak-wood furnishings and authentic Polynesian artwork, the expansive overwater villas rest above the crystal-clear lagoon, providing stunning views across the shoreline. 8 night accommodation package from $16,239* per person share twin Additional nights from $4099 per person share twin Travel 20 Sep - 31 Oct 25 8 night accommodation package from $11,369* per person share twin Additional nights from $2539 per person share twin Travel 30 Nov - 18 Dec 25, 05 Jan - 12 Feb 26, 23 Feb - 08 Mar 26 8 night accommodation package from $13,099* per person share twin Additional nights from $3119 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 22 Feb 26, 09 Mar - 24 Mar 26 1 Bedroom Mountain View Overwater Bungalow Suite Featuring traditional teak-wood furnishings and authentic Polynesian artwork, our expansive overwater villas rest above the crystal-clear lagoon, offering breathtaking mountain views. 8 night accommodation package from $19,659* per person share twin Additional nights from $5235 per person share twin Travel 20 Sep - 31 Oct 25 8 night accommodation package from $12,859* per person share twin Additional nights from $3039 per person share twin Travel 30 Nov - 18 Dec 25, 05 Jan - 12 Feb 26, 23 Feb - 08 Mar 26 8 night accommodation package from $15,169* per person share twin Additional nights from $3809 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 22 Feb 26, 09 Mar - 24 Mar 26 Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct Hilton Hotel Tahiti: Excludes local tax XPF150 per night per person & resort fee XPF1356 per night per room payable direct. (^resort fee covers the Wifi, 10% discount on 90min spa treatment per day). If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Bora Bora sightseeing optional add-ons Ultimate Shark & Ray Watching Full Day Tour Including Motu Lunch Embark on a motorized outrigger boat to meet the colourful fish, stingrays and black tip sharks that swim in the waters of Bora Bora. Enjoy the ukulele sound’s while cruising the lagoon while your Polynesian guide will lead you to the motu where a tasty lunch of grills and typical Tahitian dishes is prepared for you. Sit on one of the common large tables and enjoy a local entertainment while sipping a cool drink. Pricing based on hotel pick up and drop off from select Bora Bora accommodation. Operates: Daily Price from $345 per adult, $175 per child (4-12 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Jet Ski 2 Hour Guided Tour Go on a fun filled adventure around the Bora Bora lagoon on your own jet ski with your guide out in front. This is the perfect opportunity to take in all the lagoon’s blue hues and snap some incredible photos of the island and lagoon (waterproof compartment for cameras on the jet ski). Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information. Operates: Daily Price from $475 per Jet Ski Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Minimum age 16 years to drive a Jet Ski Mountain 4WD Safari - Natura Discovery Half Day Tour Get in a 4WD vehicle to discover the wild interior of Bora Bora, its WW2 remains not forgetting the spectacular panoramic views over the lagoon’s blue shadings. This tour is mainly focused on culture, including among others the visit of unknown archaeological sites located on private family lands. You will also make a stop at “mama Ruta’s” for a pareo traditional dyeing demonstration and sampling of local fruits. Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information Operates: Daily Price from $159 per adult, $79 per child (2-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Walk in the Valley of the Kings - Half Day Tour Discover through this ethnobotanical walk other treasures of Bora Bora, it’s mountains and rich nature. Your guide will explain how Polynesians use plants in their traditional medicine, before leading you at the foot of Mounts Otemanu and Pahi, where lies a giant banyan among other trees. These beautiful landscapes are not to be missed! Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information Operates: Daily Price from $125 per person Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Minimum age 5 years Tahiti sightseeing optional add-ons Tahiti Museum & Circle Island Tour - Half Day Afternoon Tour This is the perfect half day tour to discover some of the treasures of Tahiti. The tour starts along the west coast with a visit to the Museum of Tahiti & Her Islands, the country’s fist institution to showcase the treasures of Polynesia’s natural & cultural heritage. Next, head for the Vaipahi water garden for a refreshing stroll among pools, waterfalls, flowers and tropical plants. After crossing the isthmus of the Tahiti Iti peninsula, the landscape of the east coast becomes wilder - it's still a bit of the Tahiti of yesteryear. A few kilometres further on, make a stop at Trou du Souffleur, a marine geyser known in ancient times as Anahoho "the howling cave", before heading into the forest to the 3 Te Fa'aurumai waterfalls natural site. End your tour of the island with a visit to Pointe Vénus, where the Endeavour docked in 1769, Captain Cook's ship of exploration on a mission to observe the passage of Venus in front of the sun in 77 countries. Pricing based on hotel pick up and drop off from select Papeete accommodation. Operates: Tues-Sun Price from $149 per adult, $75 per child (3-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Papeete Street Food & Walking City Tour - Half Day Morning Tour Introduce your taste buds to the delicious flavours of local street food while visiting downtown Papeete. This Tour combines food tastings while discovering Tahiti's history walking through the city's emblematic places and, witnessing this Polynesian cultural melting pot. It is, with this mix that gives the local culinary culture its signature with the snacks and Tahitian favourite sweet & salty treats. 10 to 12 tastings are included depending on the season and the availability of vendors during the tour. This tour cannot cater for dietary restrictions. Pricing based on making your way to the meeting point – transfers available at extra cost please ask us for more information. Operates: Mon, Tues, Thurs Price from $255 per person (minimum age 12 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Mountain 4WD Safari - Full Day Tour Take a 4x4 to the very heart of the island of Tahiti. Admire the valley of Papenoo which is famous for its rivers and enjoy the incredible waterfall and tropical plant views. This is a relaxing place where you can really get back to nature. Your guide will be present throughout the journey and will answer any questions you may have about local flora and fauna and geology. Pricing based on hotel pick up and drop off from select Papeete accommodation. Operates: Mon-Sat Price from $185 per adult, $125 per child (3-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Discover Tahiti by Boat Snorkelling Tour - Half Day with Lunch Included Snorkelling in Tahiti is a must! Embark on a boat tour to explore the riches of the lagoon of Tahiti. Snorkelling stops in the lagoon and oceanside are planned to discover stingrays and turtles in their natural environment. Enjoy a delicious lunch of local specialties served onboard. After lunch enjoy more swimming and snorkelling in the lagoon before heading back to your hotel. Pricing based on hotel pick up and drop off from select Papeete accommodation. Operates: Daily Price from $355 per adult, $255 per child (3-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Sales to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 28 Jul 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Package prices for accommodation and transfers are land only. International and domestic flights are additional. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • EXCLUDES: Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora: Excludes Local City Tax XPF150 pp per night - payable direct. Hilton Hotel Tahiti: Excludes local tax XPF150 per night per person & resort fee XPF1356 per night per room payable direct. (^resort fee covers the Wifi, 10% discount on 90min spa treatment per day). • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits must be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. Click here for finance terms and conditions. Optional Sightseeing add on conditions: Prices are valid as at 28 May 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. If tour is booked on its own and not part of the advertised package, a handling fee of $40 per person, per file will apply (price subject to change with exchange rate). Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Minimum/Maximum passenger numbers apply to the tours. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
